name: People Power Solar Cooperative - Web Application
description:
Over the 2019 - 2020 school year, Blueprint has partnered with People Power Solar Cooperative to create a web dashboard application.

People Power Solar Cooperative is a nonprofit that provides resources for communities to take ownership of solar power, particularly low-income communities, communities of color, and frontline communities that have been disproportionately harmed by the fossil fuel industry.

This dashboard creates the infrastructure for People Power Solar to formalize and scale up their processes as well as manage their members more easily as their organization continues to grow.

The designer for this project is Iris Hou (https://www.irishou.design/), and you can read more about the design process here: (https://medium.com/blueprint/people-power-solar-cooperative-a-case-study-137e9958b9c)

You can learn more about Blueprint, Technology for Nonprofits at our website calblueprint.org
